alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 3:46AM CST until March 10 at 9:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW ENDING THIS MORNING... .Light to moderate snow will end from west to east as a storm system pulls away from the region. Minor blowing and drifting snow is possible. Snow covered and slippery roads are expected through the morning commute. Use extra caution if traveling. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Portage, Waushara, Wood, and Waupaca Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
